query: SELECT id, name, profile FROM agents WHERE id IN ('logic_scorer', 'innovation_scorer', 'expression_scorer');
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2EWZNYNSuTKGjiZ.root --database DmM4Thn8jeAVUsEhuTH7VK --execute SELECT id, name, profile FROM agents WHERE id IN ('logic_scorer', 'innovation_scorer', 'expression_scorer');
stdout:
id	name	profile
